ans: Having gone through the frustration of forgetting about a subscription trial and having to pay for the full membership. I realized that a simple, practical software to track my subscriptions would be extremely useful. As a result, I came up with Subly. I hope you find it as useful as I do.

que: Can I use Subly to track payments other than subscriptions?
ans: Absolutely. Subly can be used to track and manage any recurring payments.

que: How many subscriptions can I track?
ans: The Free version of Subly allows you to track up to 10 subscriptions. If you would like to track more than 10 subscriptions, please consider upgrading to the Pro version.
